## Graficos

### Chart 2

```{r}
renderGauge({
  gauge(input$cambio, min = 0, max = 100, symbol = '%', 
  label = "Satisfaction", gaugeSectors( success = c(80, 100), warning = c(40, 79), danger = c(0, 39)))
})
```

### Chart 3

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  a<-input$cambio
    valueBox(a, 
           icon = "fa-pencil",
           color = ifelse(a > 50, "success", "info"))
  
})
```
